website_summaries.verdict: Large-sized tenderizer that can handle big cuts of meat. Owners highly recommend it.
pros: Includes extremely sharp 48 stainless steel blades, yielding good results with minimal pressure applied
cons: Price is a little higher than some other options
Some people report cutting themselves with sharp blades

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT Impossible to Clean....
customer_reviews.text: Love this tenderizer, works great... BUT, I cannot get the inner blades clean! Big stuff comes off, but the chicken/meat residue on the inner blades does not come off BECAUSE you cannot reach the inner blades... No release to allow bottom plate to come-off, so you have to snake cleaning cloth between blades. THIS is almost impossible to do without a manic personality, maybe not even then! Didn't use till this weekend and past my return date otherwise I would return. Too bad because it tenderizes very well.
customer_reviews.author: Norah S.

customer_reviews.title: Gets Stuck in Down Position
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this tenderizer for almost 5 months now. It initially worked great. As time went on, the tenderizer would get stuck in the down position, especially on thick cuts of meat. I was forced to constantly hold a butter knife in the other hand to force in between the blades and plastic platform, just to get the device to release the meat. This made the process difficult and time consuming. I finally gave up and bought another type.
customer_reviews.author: love2camp

customer_reviews.title: Thet used to laugh when I sat down to cook!
customer_reviews.text: How could adding not a grain of European seasoning, nor exotic marinade spiced with a remote Asian hillside root, make my steaks as yummy, crispy, flushed with bounds of flavor doing exactly everything I had always done except...stab it with these-- 48 is it?-- miniature swords? I don't know. But I tell you what...ask my friends and family whose cook out comic routine was how adequately OK I was at steaks. They ain't laughing no more. I don't tell them what I did (no one allowed pre-preparation!) But now I'm considered King of Roost. Try this, just don't tell anybody your secret. Promise you, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: ClownOfTheKings

customer_reviews.title: Meat the way it was meant to taste!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who likes meat should try it tenderized by this meat tenderizer! It's so so so good! I initially thought that poking holes in the meat would make it lose it's juices but it makes the meat so soft and delicious! I first had meat made with this type of tenderizer at a korean BBQ place and I knew I had to try preparing meat that way myself. The device is easy to use (but very dangerous so please use caution), and comes with a handy plastic cover for the bottom end. I do recommend looking up videos on how to properly use it first though.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyd713

customer_reviews.title: must have in every kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe I have not written a review for this yet. This tenderizer has now become a staple in my kitchen! It is easy to use, and clean and does not splatter meat juice everywhere to tenderize meat. I have used it from pork chops to steaks, and even chicken to get in a quick setting marinade. This is a must have for all cooks, beginners to pros!
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Oh tender meatness!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! I use it on my steaks and my jerky meat before I smoke it. Easy to use and just make sure you wash it right away or it'll be hard to get out the little bits later. VERY SHARP. Don't be stupid and pretend to tenderize yourself or you will get tenderized haha.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Klemoo Meat Tenderizer Tool
customer_reviews.text: Did not perform as saw in the reviews. Also did not have any instructions and all the information on the box was in French. Looks like it came from Vietnam. Very sharp indeed, so BE CAREFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Garden of Eden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, I went a little crazy with it and the meat turned into mush. My fault- Now I've got the hang of it. Really does tenderize meat and works just as advertised. Glad I bought it. I have always used a meat mallet for tenderizing and this is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This device does a great job tenderizing steak or chops. After I use it I place it on the top rack of the dishwasher and it always comes out looking brand new. After seeing mine I have had several friends order this as well. Would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Tenderizer allows the marinade to really get into he meat and giving it a much better flavor. Make sure to wash right after you ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this, he received a smoker for Christmas and has been BBQing more. He used the tenderizer and then marinades the meat overnight. Tenderizer allows the marinade to really get into he meat and giving it a much better flavor. Make sure to wash right after you use it or the meat will dry on it and gets harder to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: HLeyva

customer_reviews.title: Yum-O
customer_reviews.text: Had my first steak tenderized with this product. It was a Porterhouse that was on sale and in my freezer for a while. Obviously bones are a problem, but careful positioning allowed me to hit it about three times on each side. Then I put it into a bag with some lemon juice and rum. Into the skillet a few hours later, and voila' great steak on a budget. No gristle, no change in flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S

customer_reviews.title: Tenderize your steaks and meats with ease with this
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a real steakhouse cook with this baby. I use it mostly whenever i buy myself a porterhouse every week or so depending on my funds because it’s much cheaper to buy than go to the steakhouse who is great i won’t lie or badmouth, but times are tough. This tenderizes with little effort on your part and if you have the right seasonings and ingredients you too can make yourself a delicious porterhouse at half the price at home. Works great on chicken too and helps reduce the cook time
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I will never regret getting this wonderful product. It is well made, easy to use, easy to clean, does a perfect job on tenderizing tough meats. I don't like using tenderizing sauces because they end up destroying the taste of the meat. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tool on flank steak and flat iron steak and it does make the meat much more tender. I use it initially with the marinade and again during the marinating.
customer_reviews.author: Linlie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! It is sturdy and quickly and easily tenderizes meat. I use it a lot with pork tenderloins and I think it makes them more tender. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable performance
customer_reviews.text: The tenderizer generally functions as promoted. It frequently sticks in the down (knives-out) position when using on meat, and requires intervention to retract the blades. It also occasionally sticks in the up position as well. The only practical way to clean it is by soaking. Disassembly is a major pain.
customer_reviews.author: Noel H.

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck not that great
customer_reviews.text: Okay well first off the black part gets stuck on one side all the time you basically have to hold the bottom black piece up while using the blades not that great took me forever to get a piece of chicken stuck in the blades out
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out. I bought two prime boneless ribeyes. It doesn't release easily and ripped one if the two steaks apart. However, these were two of the best steaks I ever cooked. I will test on a brisket and update my post. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Spends Too Much Here

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully on game meat
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully on game meat! I brought this meat tenderizer for ram meat. Before using this device I tried cooking the ram meat and it was extremely chewy and almost inedible. I didn't want to waste the meat so I brought this tenderizer hopping that it would resolve my dilemma and it exceeded my expectations. I cooked the ram meet for only two hours and it was so tender and flavorful. Now I use this for all meats I cook. Buy it and you would not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: BKSoldierDiva

customer_reviews.title: this thing works !!!
customer_reviews.text: i tried it on a fresh select grade sirloin ( known to be tough ) then grilled it as usual the steak was definitely more tender , plus it was nice and juicy this meat tenderizer does exactly what the seller claims
customer_reviews.author: calvin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When using on steak, the blades kept getting stuck. Potential of getting stabbed when removing. When washing, the bottom tray fills with water. Very sturdy and do like the case.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: Tje problem for me is that when I try to use it it jams up when pushing the device down. It may be just a factory flaw in the one I have but I will not be sending it back. Just to much aggravation. Sorry I was hoping for better results. Cant use it the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gulledge

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, but sticks sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I like that it will slice through many cuts of meat, but it sometimes gets stuck in the meat and requires you to manually dislodge it. It is also a bit tricky to clean because of the many blades.
customer_reviews.author: WoodyOne4U

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used immediately on some NY strips and other than sticking in meat a little due to thickness works awesome. Just gotta hold down the cut of meat.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Tough Steak Edible
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely finicky teenager who will only eat super lean meat.. with this tenderizer i can get a cheap grilled steak into him daily without a problem. He only will eat steak and Lucky Charms.. You do the math.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce001

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We've been using it a while and it's stll working great! Really tenderizes meats! And you don't have to be sparing as some reviewssuggest...you can really get meat tender by being pretty liberal with the tenderizing (punching a lot of holes in it).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have worked as a meat production manager for twenty-six years. We use high tech expensive pinning machines to tenderize our meat. This little inexpensive hand held tenderizer works amazingly doing the same thing. This is a great product and we use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: No dishwasher? Don't do this one.
customer_reviews.text: What a difference in the tenderness and flavor of the meat. Another example of needing a dishwasher in my world. Real pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy this is to use and how it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use and how it fits in my hand. The plastic cover over the blades fits nicely! I'm so happy I purchased this product it's much better than the kind of meat tenderizer that you use to pound, this really works!
customer_reviews.author: WhatsUP

customer_reviews.title: Best meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best meat tenderizer I've ever owned or used. I used to use one of those hammers but once I decided to try this I was amazed how our steaks were much more tender. I threw away the hammer and I'm never looking back.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: It stabs the meat, it stabs it real good.
customer_reviews.text: Basically does what mamma bird does for the baby birds, makes the food nice and easy to eat, just with a bunch of little knives. Have fun cleaning it by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Made cuts of beef meant for kabobs super tender and juicy. I am recommending this to all my friends!! I was told to get the tool by a chef of a local steak house, as he said he uses it on all cuts of meat at his restaurant. Worth the price. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Not a useful product
customer_reviews.text: Not well made, NOT dishwasher safe (therefore impossible to clean properly), and increases the risks of food-borne illnesses. Also just feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ZestyKy

customer_reviews.title: Don't pound your protein!
customer_reviews.text: Turns even the toughest cuts of shoe leather into restaurant quality, tender, most steak. ...kidding of course. This is a less noisey, less destructive alternative to pounding your protein.
customer_reviews.author: JT Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Sure amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful. This is beyond sharp. But amazing product. The hard part to clean, is the fact you have to hold down the plastic gaurd to clean the sharp blades.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It works makes meat easier to cook. I sous ...
customer_reviews.text: It works makes meat easier to cook. I sous vide my steak with and without using this. the one I used tenderizer seems more soft and seasoned. be-careful it's very sharp I got cut twice cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Egg

customer_reviews.title: A tenderizer that works.....
customer_reviews.text: This is the very first meat tenderizer I have purchased that does what it says. My wife and I are very satisfied. It works on both pork and beef.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Flats

customer_reviews.title: what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: nice working and easy to clean.wonderful tool-makes everything fork tender!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn l

customer_reviews.title: Every cook needs one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I waited 73 years until I finally tried one of these. It is wonderful and does exactly what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene A. Meleskie

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Gets stuck in the meat, have to pull it out
customer_reviews.author: Woodcj

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. This has a pretty large tenderizing area and makes quick work of meats like flank and carne asada. I was worried about cleanup, but it cleans easily and quickly. This feels like it should last for a good number of years.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gale

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The wife said she loves it. Also a lot quieter compared to the meat tenderizer hammer.
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very impressed with this tenderizer. It works much better than one of the traditional hammer types. I will be getting a couple of these for gifts in the near future and will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this type of tenderizer that makes an inexpensive piece of meat taste expensive. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Get ya one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tenderizer, and I love that it comes with the safety cover. I will be using this lots in my much-used family kitchen. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the grilling tool kit - cheap cuts and marinades!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean. This thing is real handy for using on cheap cuts of meat or meats you are going to use a liquid marinade. Great tool to add to the grill.
customer_reviews.author: AvidConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Husband absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Husband said he wishes I bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Phillips

customer_reviews.title: ... few time on some venison and it does a wonderful job. Takes seconds to use and meat has ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few time on some venison and it does a wonderful job. Takes seconds to use and meat has been coming out so tender, and so easy to clean up real fast after.
customer_reviews.author: SaraO

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from having to take time to clean it correctly but safely, it does the job and has held up well the few times I've used it so far. I also like the safety cover it comes with .
customer_reviews.author: MrsRod33

customer_reviews.title: ... bundle of $ because cheap cuts of meat can easily be made edible
customer_reviews.text: Save a bundle of $ because cheap cuts of meat can easily be made edible!
customer_reviews.author: Fdavet

customer_reviews.title: Used this on my throne steak and I could literally ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my t bone steak and I could literally rip the steak apart with my fingers no knife needed
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you are serious about cooking meat you need this product. It tenderizes your meat to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Pace

customer_reviews.title: Works well and cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: Great for tenderizing beef, chicken and pork. Easy to clean in the dishwasher. Be careful if cleaning by hand as the blades are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Z.

customer_reviews.title: but it does a great job of tenderizing meat
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to clean, but it does a great job of tenderizing meat.
customer_reviews.author: Joelh1

customer_reviews.title: Meat is nice and tender when we put it on the grill
customer_reviews.text: Works every time. Meat is nice and tender when we put it on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Truman Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Made the meat very tender and cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pullen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This gadget seems to be very well made with high quality components. It's bigger than I anticipated and would be good if it was a little wider and not as long, but I've never used one of these... so it may be perfect after I get used to it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna O.

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, easy to use, and does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to tenderize some tough venison steaks and it sure does the job! I use it for all my tougher cuts of meat. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: If you love your meat tender, try this product!
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is easy to use. The only downside is a bit hard to clean. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Graham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wish I bought it like 10 years ago. Works on everything- pork, chicken, steaks.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkingAgain

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. Just a bit of a learning curve to use properly. It is heavy duty it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Haase

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. Not near as messy as a tenderizing hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... eye of round roast beef--both were more tender-we are pleased.
customer_reviews.text: used on boneless pork chops and an eye of round roast beef--both were more tender-we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclops50

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most flavorful pieces of meat are often the toughest. This kitchen tool breaks that rule!!! Thank you KLEMOO
customer_reviews.author: Craig Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Works like a charm. Pierces the meat easy and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B Fun

customer_reviews.title: Sharp needles, careful
customer_reviews.text: A must have, does a great job on tougher meat
customer_reviews.author: Animal Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this! Couldn't prepare my steaks without it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on thick Steaks. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: BBee

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It does a wonderful job of actually tenderizing the meat but it is impossible to get it perfectly clean every time. I only used it twice before just throwing it out
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent meat tenderizer. Highly recommend. Will make your meat so very tender and allow marinate to get all the way through the meat for full bodied flavor. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of breaking down the meat and make it easier to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great tool- does what it claims! Great if you are marinating meat as well!
customer_reviews.author: christopher peers

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly as expected. Meat was very tender after ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as expected. Meat was very tender after use. Han did get a little tired after a while
customer_reviews.author: matthew w. ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but it’s a struggle to get it to release after it is in the meat. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Yi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, useful kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items ever purchased. Sure beats stabbing with a fork!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: We meal prep for the whole week on Sunday. It does a great job tenderizing all the meat we grill. Saves about 30 min on our meal prep! Fantastic investment!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsRob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this works well easy to clean not hard to use i have carpel tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the way this meat tenderizer works. By using the tenderizer after you season your steak of favorite meat, it helps push the seasoning inside and make the meat more flavorful. This type of tenderizer is so much easier to use than the hammer type, it more evenly flattens and aerates.This product does have 48 very sharp blades and you should be careful with them! I am very happy that this is Dishwasher safe, cleaning is easy and storage after is as well. This tenderizer does come with a cover to protect the blades when not in use. This is a well made item and should last many years around my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Dido

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works so well I cut my hand while feeling how sharp the blades were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this meat tenderizer. Easy to use easy to clean. Its great!!
customer_reviews.author: Cworsham11

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had used this type before and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every kitchen needs one of these. Turns any meat into a filet mignon
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Gal

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works very well.. Also is very sharp.. It's easy to use. We will use it regularly
customer_reviews.author: Shawna t

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Not as sturdy as other I've had, but for the price I paid I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie & Natalie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was for someone as gift so I really do not know.
customer_reviews.author: Ed U

customer_reviews.title: Tenderizes perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I remember when I was a young boy and my mother would beat the dickens out of a round steak to make it tender for supper. Hey, I have one of those relics in my kitchen drawer. I was skeptical, but have to admit that the KLEMOO meat tenderizer is wonderful. The blades go deep into the meat to break up the fibers and allow marinades to go deeper into the meat. This makes it so tender and flavorful. It's easy on the hand to use, and after your done, it cleans up easy with hot soapy water and a small brush. I have used this several times and I am totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: My husband has fallen in love with this item
customer_reviews.text: My husband has fallen in love with this item. He is a chef for 30+ years and usually scores his meats. He said that this was faster and did a better job at breaking down the fibers making the meat much tender.
customer_reviews.author: lineblack

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once so far but I am thoroughly impressed. The tenderizer is super easy to use, it takes less than a minute to push it down on top of the meat. I cleaned it immediately afterwards so had no issues. We had recently ordered some steaks in bulk and after using the new tenderizer the meat was much softer and tasted a whole lot better. I will continue to use this and would definitely recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L.

customer_reviews.title: If You Eat Beef You Need This!
customer_reviews.text: I never used to make London Broil , Flank Steak and other tougher cuts. I saw one of my cooks at work using this type of device on Flank Steak and it was incredible! The "needles" tenderize the beef and make any marinade better penetrate the meat. I tried it with a top round london broil - making multiple piercings on each side - then marinated with olive oil, cider vinegar, garlic powder, salt and pepper for overnight. Grilled then finished with indirect heat until an internal temperature of about 125 Deg for rare - it was FANTASTIC! Will always use this now for tougher cuts of meat - highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic!!! Don't know how we lived without it. It works well and as advertised. Have used it on steak lamb and chicken and it comes out fab. Even if you use a lowers grade of steak and cook it well done, it still comes out tender. Makes it much easier for the kids to chew. I put the spices on before tenderizing, and it drives the flavor into the meat and it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sharp and tenderizes wonderfully.  Great for painful hands.
customer_reviews.text: I have always jabbed the meats with a fork. Not only is this dangerous, it is not very efficient. I developed tendonitis throughout my hands and the fork jabbing is difficult at best. I used this gadget on chicken and I am truly impressed. It is easy to push down, those blades are sharp, and easy to get the nails to retract. The grilled chicken was very tender.
customer_reviews.author: rstonepal

customer_reviews.title: Priceless!
customer_reviews.text: Bought pork chops in bulk at the wholesale warehouse. The first half I pounded with a meat tenderizer mallet, and it was still ridiculously tough. I used this KLEMOO tenderizer on the second half and it was crazy tender! It was hard to believe it was from the same batch of meat. I only wish I had found this tool many years ago. Priceless!
customer_reviews.author: 808D

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: We love grilling. It's an almost everday thing here in our home. I found this meat tenderizer and after reading reviews decided to give it a try. Have to say we love it. Works good. It comes with a cover and the metal is very very sharp. Have to apply some pressure but it works well. You have some nice tender steaks afterwards. Good product. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: ShanH

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 1st use within 30 seconds of use. . .
customer_reviews.text: As headline states broke upon 1st use trying to tenderize some lean beef shoulder roast for beef jerky prep. Not impressed with quality from my experience to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: brad s.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed or downright defective.
customer_reviews.text: Received today and used several hours later. It is either defective or poorly designed. One of the blades catches on the housing every second or third go round. Really disappointed, DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: larry elliott

customer_reviews.title: Meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: What a great item for food prepping. Each individual needle is sharp and sturdily connected to the main housing. This will help get all the marinade into the protein and tenderize it. Now I can taste a whole lot of flavor when I eat my steaks!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sessa

customer_reviews.title: prongs get stuck in meat when using
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good when we purchased ut when you push down to get the prongs into the meat they stick in it and you have to pull the meat off to move it to the next section. Other than that it fits well in your hand and cleans pretty decently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing will transform your fajita game!
customer_reviews.text: This thing will transform your fajita game! You can buy cheaper cuts of meat and use this for tenderizing and the meat will cut with a fork if you have used it "enough" for your meat. I typically use a skirt steak for fajitas and with about 100 stabs all over the meat with this thing and the steak is perfect and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: "morlyn1"

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Use before pounding out to make the meat easier to get thin. Use without pounding out to tenderize and make tunnels for baste. This thing is great. Toss it in the dishwasher and done.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McFly

customer_reviews.title: It really works! I purposely bought some tougher cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I purposely bought some tougher cuts of meat.... used this, let them soak in marinade for 2 days and it w as extremely tender. Cheap cut mind you, but this worked. It would've got 5 stars but it's hard to clean and a slight bit flimsy, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: steve cow

product_meta.title: KLEMOO Meat Tenderizer Tool - 48 Ultra Sharp Needle Stainless Steel Blades Kitchen Tool for Chicken, Steak, Beef, Pork, Fish, Make a Difference in Tenderness (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackGet KLEMOO Needle Meat Tenderizer, Make a Difference in the Meat! Enjoy the Tenderness and Flavor!

It is depressing to find your meats come out with dry, tough, chewy, even though you have made carefully preparation and soaked with your favorite marinades over night. 
Enjoy Tenderness Melted in Your Mouth! 
It's not magic but can turn a top sirloin cut of meat into a New York strip tenderness wise. The needle tenderizer is a must kitchen tool for grilling, baking or cooking. 
It is well constructed with food grade ABS plastic handle and 48 razor sharp 420 stainless steel blades that won’t become dull using for several years. 
Just a press of a button, the hand held tenderizer machine will easily penetrate the steaks, beef, chicken breast, pork, wild game, fish, even pork skin. 
It creates tiny channels within the meat, which help your meat absorb marinades more faster and deeper. They allow your favorite marinades to add flavor throughout the meat, not just the surface as before. 
Besides, the tiny channels make heat to penetrate the meat evenly across varying thickness to prevent under / over cooking and reduce cooking time by up to 40%, resulting in juicer and more flavorful meats.

Easy to clean: 
3).Dishwasher Safe, simply put it top shelf of dishwasher immediately after use.
4).Hand-washed, 1. Soaked in soapy/hot water for a while; 2. Rinsed with hot water, shake off excess water and air dry.

Notes:
Extremely sharp blades, keep out of reach of children!!!
To protect the blades, use a wood, bamboo, polypropylene or polyethylene cutting boards, not glass or ceramic.
feature_bullets: Razor Sharp Knife Blades - with 48 ultra sharp stainless steel blades, these meat tenderizer blades create tiny channels within the meat and break down the connective tissues that make meat tough and chewy, transforms even the toughest cuts into tender gourmet delights.

Reduce Marinade & Cooking Time - These tiny channels within the meat allow marinades to be fully absorbed into the meat in as little as 5 minutes. They also allow heat to penetrate more quickly to reduce cooking time by up to 40%.

Maximize Meat’s Tenderness & Flavor - Less cooking time means less loss of natural flavors and juices. The tiny channels provide marinades pathway deep into the meat and help cook more evenly by reducing shrinkage, resulting in much more juicy and flavorful meat.

Easy to Use & Control - Ergonomic design with a comfortable, non-slip handle. Simply press down on the top and the sharp blades cut through the toughest fibers of your particular cut of meat. Requiring very little energy to use.
Easy Clean up - The professional meat tenderizer tool is top-rack dishwasher safe. Comes with a clear protective plastic cover for safe storage and keeping your tenderizer sanitary.
